name: part_010
file: tmp_【3D SHOWCASE】SHARPLY Unsheathed. Here I Go! 3Dお披露目配信！これが古代兵器の本気。 #AnyaMelfissa3D [QVxgwstf-Aw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Anya and Watame finishing their MC segment together after their performance.
Anya performs a DJ set featuring the song 'Identity Voices' while Ollie and Reine dance and hype up the crowd.
MC segment with the Hololive Indonesia 2nd Generation (HoloRo) members Anya, Ollie, and Reine.
Performance of the song 'Gekkou' by Anya, Ollie, and Reine.

subtitles.original: ...でかいでしょ
subtitles.english: ...is big, right?

subtitles.original: もう どっちがでかいのか もうわかんないよ
subtitles.english: I don't even know which one of us is bigger anymore.

subtitles.original: まあね
subtitles.english: Well, yeah.

subtitles.original: ありがとね もう 来てくれて嬉しい
subtitles.english: Thank you. I'm so happy you came.

subtitles.original: こちらこそ こちらこそだよ
subtitles.english: The pleasure is mine, really.

subtitles.original: また遊ぼうね
subtitles.english: Let's play again.

subtitles.original: また遊ぼう
subtitles.english: Let's play again.

subtitles.original: また遊びましょう わためぇ
subtitles.english: Let's play again, Watame.

subtitles.original: これも これもぜひ あの やりたいよね いつか
subtitles.english: I'd definitely love to do this again sometime.

subtitles.original: やりたい
subtitles.english: I want to.

subtitles.original: こういうゲーム あるよね
subtitles.english: There are games like this, right?

subtitles.original: こういうゲーム あるんじゃない
subtitles.english: I think there are games like this.

subtitles.original: あるんじゃない ねえ
subtitles.english: There are, aren't there?

subtitles.original: やろう やろうよ
subtitles.english: Let's do it.

subtitles.original: いつでも呼んで
subtitles.english: Call me anytime.

subtitles.original: ということで 来てくれてありがとう
subtitles.english: So, thank you for coming.

subtitles.original: お邪魔しました
subtitles.english: Thank you for having me.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Woi, kita akhirnya 3D!
subtitles.english: Hey, we're finally 3D!

subtitles.original: 3D! Apa ya Allah!
subtitles.english: 3D! Oh my God!

subtitles.original: Akhirnya 3D! Apa ya Allah!
subtitles.english: Finally 3D! Oh my God!

subtitles.original: Real banget! Wah real!
subtitles.english: So real! Whoa, real!

subtitles.original: Oh ya, di belakang itu apa? Apa itu?
subtitles.english: Oh right, what's that behind us? What is it?

subtitles.original: Oh my God! Kayaknya kalau kalian ngasih suportif komen
subtitles.english: Oh my God! I think if you guys give supportive comments

subtitles.original: dan superchat kayaknya bakal lebih berkilau deh.
subtitles.english: and superchats, it'll be even shinier.

subtitles.original: Oh my God! If you guys give supportive comments and Super Chats, it's gonna be even more SHINY!
subtitles.english: Oh my God! If you guys give supportive comments and Super Chats, it's gonna be even more SHINY!

subtitles.original: Eh, by the way, kalian tahu kan ini lagu apa?
subtitles.english: Eh, by the way, you guys know what song this is?

subtitles.original: Ini kan... ini kan...
subtitles.english: This is... this is...

subtitles.original: Coba-coba suruh tebak, tebak, tebak.
subtitles.english: Try asking them to guess, guess, guess.

subtitles.original: Lagu apa dulu Chat? Ayo ayo.
subtitles.english: What song is it first, Chat? Come on.

subtitles.original: Tebak, tebak, tebak. Ayo ayo tebak.
subtitles.english: Guess, guess, guess. Come on, guess.

subtitles.original: Ada TV! Ada TV!
subtitles.english: There's a TV! There's a TV!

subtitles.original: Kureiji Ollie, bagaimana tadi? Kita... joget dan nyanyi...
subtitles.english: Kureiji Ollie, how was that? We... danced and sang...

subtitles.original: enggak nyanyi sih, joget tapi ke Identity Voices.
subtitles.english: well not sang, but danced to Identity Voices.

subtitles.original: How was that?
subtitles.english: How was that?

subtitles.original: Gue baru tahu lu bisa nge-DJ!
subtitles.english: I just found out you could DJ!

subtitles.original: Iya, that's one of my hidden skills.
subtitles.english: Yeah, that's one of my hidden skills.

subtitles.original: Well, I've been living for like hundreds of years.
subtitles.english: Well, I've been living for like hundreds of years.

subtitles.original: Oh benar juga, sudah lama.
subtitles.english: Oh right, it's been a long time.

subtitles.original: Makanya I have a lot of hidden skills. Dan Pavolia Reine, bagaimana tadi?
subtitles.english: That's why I have a lot of hidden skills. And Pavolia Reine, how was that?

subtitles.original: Tadi... kita ngapain aja ya? Saking hype-nya...
subtitles.english: Just now... what were we doing? We were so hyped...

subtitles.original: Saking hype-nya lupa kita ngapain aja.
subtitles.english: So hyped I forgot what we did.

subtitles.original: Kita nge-DJ dan joget... bergerak sendiri.
subtitles.english: We were DJing and dancing... moving on our own.

subtitles.original: Iya, bergerak. Bergerak. Aduh gila, seru banget gila.
subtitles.english: Yeah, moving. Moving. Man, it was crazy fun.

subtitles.original: Ya sudah berarti... ini aja enggak sih? Eh, by the way, itu udah berkilau!
subtitles.english: Alright then... should we just do this? Eh, by the way, it's already shiny!

subtitles.original: Ha? Enggak lah, tunggu, belum kita masih ada lagi!
subtitles.english: Huh? No way, wait, we're not done yet!

subtitles.original: Masih ada? Iya.
subtitles.english: There's more? Yes.

subtitles.original: Wah, apa tuh? Kita mau ngapain, Guys?
subtitles.english: Whoa, what is it? What are we gonna do, guys?

subtitles.original: Ngapain sih kira-kira?
subtitles.english: What do you think?

subtitles.original: Kita bakal... kita bakal itu enggak sih? Ini udah di stage bertiga.
subtitles.english: We're gonna... we're gonna do that, right? We're already on stage together.

subtitles.original: Kita mau nyanyi dan joget bareng!
subtitles.english: We're gonna sing and dance together!

subtitles.original: Yes! Kita atur-atur formasi dulu nanti.
subtitles.english: Yes! Let's get into formation.

subtitles.original: Oke, siap formasi nanti. Oke.
subtitles.english: Okay, get ready for formation. Okay.

subtitles.original: Oke, dengarkan, listen to our song...
subtitles.english: Okay, listen, listen to our song...

subtitles.original: our cover song I guess.
subtitles.english: our cover song I guess.

subtitles.original: Oke! Gekkou!
subtitles.english: Okay! Moonlight!

subtitles.original: ガラクタだとかゴミを詰めて
subtitles.english: Filled with junk and trash

subtitles.original: ボロ布ひとつを被せた
subtitles.english: I covered it with a rag

subtitles.original: 目に食い込んだ影をした
subtitles.english: I had shadows digging into my eyes

subtitles.original: 偽物
subtitles.english: Fake

subtitles.original: 誰かが紡いだ言葉を
subtitles.english: Words someone else spun

subtitles.original: 誰かが奏でた色を
subtitles.english: Colors someone else played

subtitles.original: 歪にコラージュした
subtitles.english: I collaged them distortedly

subtitles.original: 偽物
subtitles.english: Fake

subtitles.original: 一番最初の青の中
subtitles.english: In the very first blue

subtitles.original: 革新的な少年の愛情が
subtitles.english: A revolutionary boy's love

subtitles.original: ほら
subtitles.english: Look

subtitles.original: 僕ら気づいたらもう見えなくなる
subtitles.english: By the time we noticed, we could no longer see

subtitles.original: おもちゃ失くした子供も泣いている
subtitles.english: Even the child who lost their toy is crying

subtitles.original: どうしたら終わるのスポットライトに
subtitles.english: When will it end? Under the spotlight

subtitles.original: 照らされている
subtitles.english: Being illuminated

subtitles.original: その背中は
subtitles.english: That back

subtitles.original: まだこの手から遠ざかっていく
subtitles.english: Is still drifting further from this hand

subtitles.original: あなたみたいになれやしなくて
subtitles.english: I can never become like you
